title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: The mineral spring called Moffat Well is situated on the side of a beautiful linn a mile and a half from the village.

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: We were to halt for breakfast atMoffat Well did I know the moors we weremarching over, having hunted and hawked on every

title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: Wat, thinking theywere people going to Moffat Well whom he mightnot see again, overlooked the deviation.
